title: Preseason Coaches Poll Released
description:
Matt Schick, Greg McElroy and Desmond Howard discuss who's underrated and who's overrated in the preseason coaches poll. They also break down the most intriguing preseason quarterback battles across the country.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew reacts to the preseason coaches poll being released
